text: kertay' darasal aasmanon our zamin ke meeress ka malik (tanha) Allah hi hai tum main say jin logo ney fatah say pehlay fi subilillah diya hai our qitaal kiya hai woh (doosron kay) barabar nahi bulkay unn say boht baray darjay kay hain jinhon nay fatah kay baad kheyraaten den our jahad kiyey haan bhalaee ka wada to Allah taalaaka unn sab say hai jo kuch tum ker rahey ho uss say Allah khabardaarhai
